title: We're not the only ones obsessed with Preet Bharara.  Plus, the vaccine mandate divide and Friend of Pivot Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman
summary:
Guest host Preet Bharara reacts to getting in Team Cuomo's crosshairs. Friend of Pivot Retired Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman on the phone call that changed his life, and his new book, Here, Right Matters: An American Story. Also: Apple's new child safety measures pique privacy advocates, while Chinese giant Tencent faces a lawsuit for not protecting children.
